entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 01:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
